duties_responsibilities.duty: Work one on one with individuals in their homes and out in the community to help them work towards individually identified goals that promote independence.
Provide support for meal preparation, community integration, household management, and obtaining/maintaining employment in the community.
Collaborate with Program Manager/Director to create a flexible schedule with morning, daytime, evening, and weekend shifts.
Report to the Program Manager and spend time supporting individuals with various abilities inside their home.
